version_description:
Redesigned Interface
Purchasing Service Plans
Adding Service Cards PINs
Auto-Refill Enrollment
Reserve Management
Profile Management
Credit Card Management
Handset Protection Enrollment
Chat with Customer Support
Customer Feedback
Ticket History
Transaction and Payment History

* Supports latest security standards.
* Improved Service Plan Purchase and Auto Refill Enrollment.
* Improvements on performance and stability.
* 3D Touch menu support for available devices.
* Easy credit card entry with scan support.
* An all new notification widget for easy access to your favorite device.
* A friendly reminder to refill your account.
* Easy access to customer service by a one touch chat.
* Friendly Auto Refill option while purchasing a service plan
Performance and Stability Improvements.
Support for no devices while accessing an account and widget connectivity improvements.
Enhanced Data Usage Tracking from both app and widget.

•Support for iOS 10 notification widget.
•Bug fixes.
•General responsiveness and platform updates.
Reliability and performance Improvements. Bug fixes
Updated Widget, and stability fixes.
You can now Activate your devices directly from the My Account App in a simple and convenient way!

This new app features improved performance and navigation.

With this update, a new design and layout was implemented. Some of the new design features include carousel menus and a complete phone dashboard with all relevant phone and plan information.

Now, you can view and manage your Rewards points on the app.

Additionally, you now have the ability to view your Global Card balance.
Updated Widget, and stability fixes.
Improved navigation and stability.  Access all your devices, and refilll the account right from within the app. Improved login flow.
Improved Security and Stability.
